title: Pulseblade Riven
body:
Look above. Now upvote.

Idea for joke quote:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OVv-J-LXQU

replies.body: tired of reddit reposts
Not everybody on these forums goes to Reddit. And those who do might miss this.

I for one do not go to Reddit, so I am happy so see post like this on the boards, even if they are re-post from else where.

With that out of the way, that picture is awesome. I'm not a huge Riven fan, but I would really be into a skin like that.

+1

This is really neat!I think the particles are really clean. I'd love to see another color mixed in, so it's not just all pink, but overall, this is an awesome idea!
I actually like the fact that there ISN'T another color mixed in. it's beautiful like that.
Pulseblade Riven chroma pack :3
Yeah, it could definitely use more than just pink, but I'm not the guy who drew it. You'd have to talk to Goomrrat on that.
It's only natural for there to be a Zero backing up every Megaman.
that is actually a very good skin I would not be surprised if it was made into a skin I may not play riven but that looks bad-arse :D.
already have every riven skin, would still buy.
Would play that, yea. Wish it was a cherry red instead of pink, but I'd manage.

Rito pls must have skin. Get to work Riot, skin is {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} 
{{champion:92}}

But Riot releasing this skin would entice people to play Riven, and with that many Riven players, River would become salt water and Mudcrab would have to evolve to survive, and become Kha'Zix, and them eventually become indestructible, and then Runeterra would be doomed.
Everything has it's drawbacks I guess.
Well very nice one i must admit so i suport it :D
10/10 would buy. Hear that Riot?
Would definitely buy
Megaman Ezreal skin + Zero Riven skin
I support this plan.
This is perhaps the best idea I've seen in a while. We need this!
Love it. I would buy even tho I don't Riven.
Incredible suggestion.
I LOVE THIS SKIN!!! I hope it can make it in the game it looks so cool
I would buy this Day 1.

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=i6dxKgBZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-05T16:03:29.066+0000)
>
> Look above. Now upvote.
> 
> Idea for joke quote:
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OVv-J-LXQU

Riot, take my $25 for this! GIMME GIMME GIMME
would buy
A DOPE AF SKIN!!!~{{champion:92}} {{summoner:14}}
WOW! so coool!

Acting level: Hentai.

Good concept. Personally, I think a Pulsefire Karma skin would be really cool.
Yeah, but that was back in the 90's, and Capcom went cheap when they gave X4 its English dub. They decided not to dub at all for X5.
That video made me LOL more than it probably should have. Would buy this.
Would buy.
This looks awesome, I would totally buy this
Downvoted because I hate Riven and other champions (like Zac) deserve skins more

"Downvoted because of some obtuse personal bullshit, not the quality of the skin or the artist's efforts"
-Someone in EU, to no one's surprise, 2015
And I downvote your comment because you're a shame for the EUNE server... -.-
Pulseblade Riven or Feed
Maybe we should fix Pulsefire Ezreal first before continuing the line >.>
Please do it :o
I. Need. This. DONE

RITO 
PLS
DO 
IT
JUST
DO
IT
PLSSSSSS
MAKE
OUR
DREAMS
COME
TRUE

dem jugs
PFE players playing Riven. Yes excellent idea.
Looks like ekko sword{{champion:245}}
I'm not gonna lie, this looks cool, but, more people would play Riven because of this. I hate Riven.

DOnt get me wrong, it looks badass, but lets not be selfish here, riven has enough skins as of now,,
how about new skins for zac,gnar,zed,kalista etc?

I love how a Riven skin on the boards for more than one day can surpass Unprepared Garen in attention.
Same thing happened with battle bunny Riven and frost booty Shyvana a few years back.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EsVELEHf-unprepared-garen-riot-pls-ultimate-skin-concept

No more female skins are allowed to come out till Unprepared Garen is made.
